summary: Adds Arrows that act as flares. This mod is for Bow lovers, if you like the idea of the magelight spell but you dont want to use magic this is the mod for you.
descriptionHtml:
TREVINS FLARE ARROWS

[youtube]Hi3GbMqFP3o[/youtube] 

What is does:
-Adds Flares that you can buy at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
-These flares are useable ammo for any bow.
-The flares light up the sky and then land like an arrow would.
-They are heavily affected by gravity and are much different than firing any other arrow. (if you fire it up in the air it will slowly return to earth but firing it straight forward, it will drop more)
-They do NOT work on stone and rock surfaces, If the flares hit stone or rock then the flare crumbles and  goes out.
-They last for a about a minute.
-IF you use the Explosive Flare version then ther flares explode on impact and do damage to a small area, as well as light the zone on fire.
-They are not over powered and are a reasonable price for purchase. 

Bugs:
-None so far :)

Other mods:
-Trevins Glowing Arrows
-Mystic Manor
-Robin Hoods Arrow
author: Trevin
